title: You should not be encouraged to int or even rewarded for it
body: {{champion:14}} passive needs to be looked at

replies.body:
Then they should remove Dark Harvest as well, because me getting killed rewards the Dark Havest teammate I have.  

There is even a strategy where everyone takes TP, runs to second tier top tower, ints to the tower, and each person collects some souls, then you TP there and do it again for more free souls.
play a {{item:3041}} champ against him and become a god

Technically if you suiciding is in fact a way to get your team a win, its not inting. Because there is a fine line between running it down and mowing a lane by any means possible

Remember when you would get executed by enemy jungle camps then steal their buff?

Edit:
And no im not defending anyone who runs it down to claim its a strat, it only works with ones like sion because he himself still gains benefits this way
